title: Over 25 mln vaccinations carried out so far: Asad Umar
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 25 (APP):Minister for Planning Development and Special Initiatives Asad Umar on Sunday said total COVID vaccinations carried out so far in the country now exceeded the mark of 25 million.
“Total number of people vaccinated has now crossed 2 crores. Further acceleration is being planned for August,” he tweeted.
Total vaccinations carried out so far now exceed two and a half crores. Total number of people vaccinated has now crossed 2 crores. Further acceleration being planned for august. By end August all major cities target is to have at least 40% of eligible population vaccinated.
— Asad Umar (@Asad_Umar) July 25, 2021
He said by the end of August, target had been set for all major cities to have at least
40 percent of eligible population vaccinated.
